casebody.data:
ACCARDI
v.
HARTFORD UNDERWRITERS INSURANCE COMPANY 42A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2019 Daniel K. Bryson, Attorney at Law, J. Hunter Bryson, Attorney at Law, for Accardi, Thomas. Stephen D. Feldman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kim E. Rinehart, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, David R. Roth, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for Hartford Underwriters Insurance Company. Mark R. Sigmon, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for United Policyholders.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 28th of February 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of March 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 1st day of May 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
